title: IAF Unveils Sudarshan S-400 in Action, Claims ‘Longest-Range Kill’ Ever Recorded - Watch - Times Now
description: Dive into the latest advancements of India's Air Force with this exclusive video showing the "longest-range kill" ever achieved using the S-400 air defence syst
content:
1. IAF Unveils Sudarshan S-400 in Action, Claims ‘Longest-Range Kill’ Ever Recorded - Watch  Times Now
  2. Video: Air Force Showcases "Longest Ever Kill In Military History" By S-400  NDTV
  3. ‘Longest ever kill in military history’: Air Force showcases S-400 intercept | Watch| India News  Hindustan Times
  4. IAF releases first operational visuals of S-400 Air Defence System months after Operation Sindoor  India TV News

Content Highlights:

- Live Demonstration: A new video showcasing the "longest-range kill" ever achieved using the S-400 air defence system. The demonstration is part of a live event featuring India's Air Force. - NDTV Exclusive Video: Watch the full video demonstrating impressive intercept capabilities with the S-400, highlighting its role in modern warfare.

- Hindustan Times Coverage: Get detailed insights into the military advancements and their potential impacts on strategic defense policies.

- India TV News Updates: Access exclusive reports from India’s leading news channels discussing the latest developments related to the S-400 system.

- Business Today Analysis: Dive deeper into the strategic implications of this video demonstration, including discussions on its role in modern warfare.

Stay tuned for more updates and insights into the cutting-edge advancements in military technology.

Stay tuned for more updates. ### FEATURED_IMAGE_PROMPT: The scene is set against a backdrop of an imposing military base, capturing the intense atmosphere during live demonstrations of advanced weaponry.
